scene_description_enriched: A crowned female figure, likely a queen or noblewoman, is depicted in profile, looking upwards. She wears a regal headdress and a mantle over her shoulders, with her hands clasped in prayer. To her left, a scroll with Latin text is unfurled. In the lower left, a circular object, possibly a shield or a coat of arms, is visible. The background is textured, suggesting a patterned fabric or a stylized architectural element. The scene appears to be devotional, possibly depicting a saint or a patron praying.
